description:
Yes? No? Maybe? Red? Green? Blue? Today? Tomorrow? ...

Making a decision sometimes might be a real nightmare. Therefore use the DecisionMaker!  

It's very useful, for example in everyday situations like "when should I go home?" or "what should I eat?". There are four default decision lists, but you might create your own lists with any content you want. Up to 25 lists are supported.

The only decision - but definitely the last one - you should make: Do I really need the DecisionMaker? The DecisionMaker surely would say: YES!

Enjoy it & have fun!

Following extensions/changes are planned for the next version:
- support for Touchpad HD
- rotation (horizontal/vertikal)
- share your lists with friends via email/mms
- exhibition mode


Usage of DecisionMaker:
------------------------------


Main Menu
- select the preferred list and tap "Go!" to start making the decision.
- the preferences menu is shown on the bottom line by tapping on the application header.

Decision List View
- by tapping the title, the list is being shuffled.
- by swiping upwards or downwards the list starts to rotate. As the list stops you will know what to do… The DecisionMaker's job is done. Take it or just restart until you got your preferred decision. For sure this is not gentlemen like

Preferences
- the default lists can be renamed and changed as you want.
- new lists are created by tapping on "New list...". Up to 25 lists are supported.
- configuration of blink & vibration.
versionNote:
New in v 1.0.3:
- support for blink & vibration added, see preferences menu.
- language support french & spanish fixed. Default localization is now 'en' (english). Sorry for any inconvenience.
- some more minor corrections.
